quests.name: Trouble in Paradise
objectives: Talk to Remy.
Enter Daisy's House to bring her the Mochas.

Uh-no, what happened here? Talk to:
  ‧ Daisy.
  ‧ Make sure you have 2 Mochas in your inventory
  ‧ Donald.

Clean Daisy's House using your Royal Tools. Remove:
  ‧ 4 The Stains
  ‧ 3 The Broken Flower Pots
Return to Daisy.
Talk to Donald.

Gather the materials for Donald in your Inventory:
  ‧ 5 Dream Shards
  ‧ 25 Hardwood
  ‧ 6 Tinkering Parts
  ‧ 4 Iron Ingots
Bring the materials to Donald.
Return to Daisy.

Plant and harvest:
  ‧ 3 Sugarcane
  ‧ 3 Wheat
  ‧ 6 Carrots
Make sure you have the Ingredients in your Inventory:

Sugarcane
  ‧ 3 Wheat
  ‧ 6 Carrots
Bring the Ingredients to Daisy.
Talk to Donald.
Listen to Donald as he gives her his gift to Daisy.
Talk to Daisy.

quests.name: Dots & Daisies
objectives:
Gather the materials for Daisy and Minnie's fashion line:
  ‧ 30 Fiber
  ‧ 30 Softwood
  ‧ 3 Blue Hydrangeas
  ‧ 5 Red Falling Penstemons
Ask Mirabel for a Sewing Machine.

Make sure you have all the materials for Minnie in your Inventory:
  ‧ 30 Fiber
  ‧ 30 Softwood
  ‧ 5 Blue Hydrangeas
  ‧ 5 Red Falling Penstemons
Sewing Machine.
Bring the materials to Minnie.
Talk to Scrooge.
Return to Daisy.
Put on the Shirt by "Dots & Daisies".
You need to be wearing the Shirt by "Dots & Daisies" for the photo shoot.
Take pictures while wearing the Shirt by "Dots & Daisies"
Return to Daisy.
Add Playful furniture to the Beach

Create a more relaxing look around the Shirt by "Dots & Daisies". Put on:
  ‧ Shirt by "Dots & Daisies".
  ‧ A pair of Sunglasses.
  ‧ Some Casual Shoes.
Take 3 pictures of your outfit on the Beach
Return to Daisy.
Meet Daisy and Minnie in the Castle near the Fountain.
Talk to Daisy.

Put on:
  ‧ The Shirt by "Dots & Daisies".
  ‧ A Purple accessory.
  ‧ A pair of Elegant Shoes.
Take 3 pictures against the studio background
Return to Daisy.
You need to be wearing the Shirt by "Dots & Daisies"

Give the Villagers some Business Cards while wearing a "Dots & Daisies" item of clothing.
  ‧ Ursula.
  ‧ ‧ Make sure you have a "House of Bows" Business Card in your Inventory.
  ‧ Anna.
  ‧ ‧ Make sure you have a "House of Bows" Business Card in your Inventory.
  ‧ Remy.
  ‧ ‧ Make sure you have a "House of Bows" Business Card in your Inventory.
Return to Daisy.
Listen to Daisy and Scrooge McDuck.
Talk to Daisy.

quests.name: Ask Daisy
objectives:
Gather the materials for the Advice Box:
  ‧ 15 Hardwood
  ‧ 3 Iron Ingots
  ‧ 5 Amethysts
Craft the Advice Box.
Make sure you have the Advice Box in your Inventory
Bring the Advice Box to Daisy.
Talk to Minnie.

Take pictures for Minnie of:
  ‧ The Giant Willow Tree in the Glade.
  ‧ The Pillar of Friendship.
  ‧ Any Statue in the Mystical Cave.
Return to Minnie.
Check on the Advice Box near Daisy's House.
Pick up the "Ask Daisy" Letters from the ground.
Make sure you have the "Ask Daisy" Letters in your Inventory.
Bring the "Ask Daisy" Letters to Daisy.

Help Daisy fulfill these Villagers' requests:
  ‧ Vanellope.
  ‧ Kristoff.
Check on the Advice Box near Daisy's House.
Pick up the Extra "Ask Daisy" Letter from the ground.
Make sure you have the Extra "Ask Daisy" Letter in your Inventory.
Bring the Extra "Ask Daisy" Letter to Daisy.

Make the Glade of Trust more relaxing by adding:
  ‧ Outdoor Seating
  ‧ An Outdoor Table
  ‧ Casual Decor
Talk to Mother Gothel.
Return to Daisy.

quests.name: The Glittered Gala
objectives: Talk to Remy.
Make sure you have the Gala Banquet in your Inventory.
Bring the Gala Banquet to Daisy.

Dress for Daisy's gala. Put on:
  ‧ Shirt by "Dots & Daisies".
  ‧ 3 Elegant items
Head inside the Dream Castle to start the gala.

Enjoy the party! Mingle with Daisy's guests.
  ‧ Talk to Daisy when you're done socializing.
Take a picture with everyone in the Castle.

What happened? There's glitter everywhere.
  ‧ Talk to Daisy.

Investigate the situation by asking the guests what they've seen. Talk to:
  ‧ Vanellope.
  ‧ Kristoff.
Return to Daisy.
Talk to Scrooge McDuck.
Follow the trail of glitter on Dazzle Beach.
Go inside the Cursed Cave.
Search the Cursed Cave for a Clue.
Make sure you have the Clue in your Inventory.
Bring the Clue to Daisy.
Talk to Stitch.
Return to Daisy.
Go to the Cursed Cave with Daisy.
Listen as Daisy confronts Vanellope and Stitch.
Talk to Daisy.
